name: Gareth_Ironforge
prompt: Portrait of Gareth_Ironforge, notable figure of Aquabyssos/Aethermoor, human, adult, realm-specific attire with unique insignia, character-driven emotion, memorable distinguishing features, signature environment hinting at their origin, dramatic, directional lighting that sculpts form, painterly fantasy realism with high detail, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Portrait of Gareth_Ironforge with distinctive attire and evocative background.
revised_prompt: Create a visually striking portrait of an adult human figure known as Gareth_Ironforge, who is renowned in the mystical realms of Aquabyssos and Aethermoor. Dress this character in attire befitting of their unique status within these realms, including distinct insignia. Make sure to capture an emotion that reflects their character. Include memorable distinguishing features and situate them within a signature environment that subtly hints at their origins. Employ dramatic, directional lighting to artistically sculpt their form. The overall aesthetic should be one of painterly fantasy realism, with a high level of detail. Please abide by the specified aspect and resolution, maintain consistency with styling tags, and make sure to avoid any artifacts.
